--- title: "LS 빅데이터 스쿨 Homework 2-2" author: "yongraegod" date: "2024-07-17" categories: [bigdata] --- ![](damgom3.jpg) ## 173 페이지 ::: {#187b336b .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np mpg = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/USER/Documents/LS빅데이터스쿨/lsbigdata-project1/data/mpg.csv') fuel = pd.DataFrame({'fl' : ['c','d','e','p','r'], 'price_fl' : [2.35, 2.38, 2.11, 2.76, 2.22]}) print(fuel) print(mpg) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` fl price_fl 0 c 2.35 1 d 2.38 2 e 2.11 3 p 2.76 4 r 2.22 manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl \ 0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p 1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p 2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p 3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p 4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p .. ... ... ... ... ... ... .. ... ... .. 229 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 auto(s6) f 19 28 p 230 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 21 29 p 231 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p 232 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 manual(m5) f 18 26 p 233 volkswagen passat 3.6 2008 6 auto(s6) f 17 26 p category 0 compact 1 compact 2 compact 3 compact 4 compact .. ... 229 midsize 230 midsize 231 midsize 232 midsize 233 midsize [234 rows x 11 columns] ``` ::: ::: *** ### Q1. `mpg`데이터에는 연료 종류를 나타낸 `fl`변수는 있지만 연료 가격을 나타낸 변수는 없습니다. 앞에서 만든 `fuel`데이터를 이용해 `mpg`데이터에 `price_fl`(연료 가격) 변수를 추가하세요. ::: {#94914b30 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg = pd.merge(mpg, fuel, how = 'left', on = 'fl') print(mpg) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl \ 0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p 1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p 2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p 3 audi a4 2.0 compact 2.76 1 compact 2.76 2 compact 2.76 3 compact 2.76 4 compact 2.76 .. ... ... 229 midsize 2.76 230 midsize 2.76 231 midsize 2.76 232 midsize 2.76 233 midsize 2.76 [234 rows x 12 columns] ``` ::: *** ### Q2. 연료 가격 변수가 잘 추가됐는지 확인하기 위해 `model`,`fl`,`price_fl` 변수를 추출해 앞부분 5행을 출력해 보세요. ::: {#1921eefe .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg[['model','fl','price_fl']].head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
model fl price_fl
0 a4 p 2.76
1 a4 p 2.76
2 a4 p 2.76
3 a4 p 2.76
4 a4 p 2.76
``` ::: :::
